Reviews.Title: The best, one can get at such a low price
Reviews.Author: Syed
Reviews.Content: Amazing phone!!! Looks great!!! Functions and speed is Comparable to I phone 4s; Although size is much smaller than iphone. I have used htc wildfire and galaxy S I will say this one is better than both of them. Although the battery charge is not lasting more than 1 day but still i m loving it...

Reviews.Title: bien
Reviews.Author: Estévez
Reviews.Content: Es De lo mejor this equipment, he aquí que ya actualizado y va de 10, sí los recomiendo 100% al Igual Que el Vendedor

Reviews.Title: My Lovely Phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Fan
Reviews.Content: I have bought this smartphone for 1 year.It is working great.I love Sony and this phone is valuable and its shape is so nice and attractive.This phone is fast and I can do whatever I want on it.I love this mobile phone most.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: mario
Reviews.Content: Hizo falta mas detalle de la venta, más fotografías, yo pensé que el celular tenía teclado físico...El celular y la entrega fueron cumplidas

Reviews.Title: Sony Released this  defective phone.
Reviews.Author: kash
Reviews.Content: This is the fastest, smallest Android around, So I bought it. I got it right away. I turned it on it acted in a strange way.Screens were popping on the their own, without any touch input, totally useless. I called Sony support they told me to upgrade the software that I did, which made no difference. I sent it back and I got my full refund. At the end I spend half a day trying to fix it, plus I lost $15 for S&H; and insurance for this defective product. By the way, if you search the web you see 1000's of complain about this phone all over the globe. What is Sony doing about it? Nada. They should recall it. They are not Apple. Remeber Sony used to rule the world with their walkman.
